title: 1987 Challenge Cup
text: The 1987 Challenge Cup was the 86th staging of <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a>'s oldest knockout competition, the <a href="Challenge%20Cup">Challenge Cup</a>. Known as the Silk Cut Challenge Cup for due to sponsorship from <a href="Silk%20Cut">Silk Cut</a>, the tournament featured clubs from the <a href="1986-87%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season">1986-87 Rugby Football League season</a>. It culminated in the final contested by <a href="Halifax%20R.L.F.C.">Halifax</a> and <a href="St%20Helens%20R.F.C.">St. Helens</a> at <a href="Wembley%20Stadium%20%281923%29">Wembley</a>. Halifax won the match 19–18.
